html:
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {% set abbr = frappe.db.get_value('Company', doc.company, 'abbr') %} {% set item_tax = frappe.get_all("Item Tax", filters={"parent": row.item_code}, fields=["item_tax_template"]) %} {% set tax_template = item_tax[0].get("item_tax_template") %} {% set tax_template_details = frappe.get_all("Item Tax Template Detail", filters={"parent": tax_template}, fields=["tax_rate"]) %} {% set vat_rate = tax_template_details[0].get("tax_rate") %} {%- for qty in range (frappe.utils.cint(row.qty)) -%}


Well Care Pharmacy W.L.L.
{{row.item_name }}
Item Code: {{row.item_code }}

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(row.expiry_date, "MM/yy")or "" }}     BD. {{ '%0.3f'|format (frappe.db.get_value("Item Price", {"item_code": row.item_code, "price_list": "Standard Selling"}, "price_list_rate" ) + (frappe.db.get_value("Item Price", {"item_code": row.item_code, "price_list": "Standard Selling"}, "price_list_rate" ) * (vat_rate)/100|float)) }}
{% if (((vat_rate))|float) ==10%} Incl. VAT {% else %} {% endif %}
